mapper.select: select question_bank_id from sw_question where sw_question.name=#{type}
select sw_role.name from sw_role join sw_user_role on sw_role.id=sw_user_role.rid join sw_user on sw_user_role.uid=sw_user.id where sw_user.id=#{id}
select count(*) from sw_simple_test where question_id=#{questionid} and user_id=#{userid}
select * from sw_exam_answer join sw_exam_message on sw_exam_message.id=sw_exam_answer.examid where sw_exam_message.userid=#{id} and sw_exam_answer.istrue=0 group by sw_exam_answer.question_title_id
select count(id) from sw_exam_answer where question_title_id=#{questionid} and istrue=0
select count(id) from sw_exam_answer where question_title_id=#{questionid}
select question_bank_id from sw_question where name=#{type} and question_type_id=#{questiontype} order by rand()
select question_bank_id from sw_question where question_bank_category_id=#{category} and question_type_id=#{type} order by rand()
